verses.roman:
prabhu dekhi' karila loka caraṇa vandana
prabhu kahe,--kāhāṅ haite karilā āgamana?

synonyms: prabhu dekhi'—seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karila—offered; loka—people; caraṇa vandana—respect unto His lotus feet; prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; kāhāṅ haite—from where; karilā āgamana—have you come.
translation: Upon seeing Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, all the people offered respects at His lotus feet. The Lord then asked them,"Where are you all coming from?"
